name: cad-engine
description: A high-performance cross-platform CAD geometry engine built with Rust, WebAssembly, TypeScript, and React

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && cd react-demo && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: npm run build:wasm && cd react-demo && npm run build
scripts.test: cd rust-core && cargo test && cd ../typescript-sdk && npm test
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd react-demo && npm install && cd ../typescript-sdk && npm install

author: Your Name
